title: Spacious, top floor 1 Bedroom
map_address: 101 Rivoli St San Francisco CA near Cole St.
posting_body: This apartment is in a 4 unit building in the best location in Cole Valley.
A rare opportunity to live in a special, vintage building.
The unit is approximately 625 sq ft.
•	4 large rooms: bedroom, living room, formal dining room, large eat-in kitchen, split bath
•	Charming and old-fashioned: Wedgewood stove, working fireplace, some beamed ceilings
•	Hardwood floors throughout
•	Parking for 1 car in shared garage
•	Good, natural light with one skylight
•	Separate, secure storage room in basement
•	Landlord pays water and garbage
•	Good closets
•	Laundry in the basement (no charge)
•	Quiet, clean building
•	Easy walk to UCSF, Cole Valley shops, N Judah
•	Sorry, no pets or smokers
•	Available immediately
•	Move-in costs: one month rent and one month security
Super location: 3 blocks to Zazie’s, Boulange, Cole Hardware.
Short walk to UCSF.
Don't miss this apartment!
Please email for a private showing.
